Asked about prospects for new gun restrictions, Representative Mike Pence , Republican of Indiana, asserted, '''I maintain that firearms in the hands of law-abiding citizens makes communities safer, not less safe.

Richard Prather , a retired auto worker from Anderson, said after the Pendleton town hall that he believed Mike Pence 's reputation as a federal spending hawk would serve him well running for the governor's office. I think he would have been a good candidate for president, but I'm glad he didn't, Richard Prather said. ''In the next race, he can run for president.'' said David Letterman . ''Being pummeled?'' Anderson Cooper said. ''I don't recommend it. I'd never been hit in the head before.''
